resources.string:
A statement that the study is research and participation is voluntary. A summary of the study including purpose, duration and procedures. Reasonable, foreseeable risks or discomforts Reasonable, expected benefits.
In order to proceed, please accept the following permissions!

You denied the access to a permission, which is needed to continue this study. To continue participating please give this app the permissions to access your sensors. Else you have to withdraw your participation and only reenter, when you accept the access to the needed sensors!
Some required location permissions are not accepted which are needed for this study. Please open the app and give your consent to track your current location!
Request for always accessing your location
Please allow the app to always access your current location to participate on the study!
To take part in this study you have to consent all needed permissions:
To participate in this study, please turn on all permissions! To reiterate, what these permissions are for, please go to settings, where those are listed!
